description_zh: V2EX 是创意工作者们的社区。这里目前汇聚了超过 750,000 名主要来自互联网行业、游戏行业和媒体行业的创意工作者。V2EX 希望能够成为创意工作者们的生活和事业的一部分。
description_en: V2EX is a community for creative workers. Currently, it has brought together over 750,000 creative workers mainly from the internet, gaming, and media industries. V2EX hopes to become a part of the lives and careers of creative workers.
rating_zh: 可以在分享创造频道发布自己的最新作品，可以免费曝光，主要受众人群为程序员、产品经理等
rating_en: You can post your latest works on the sharing and creation channel, where they will be exposed for free. The main audience includes programmers, product managers, etc.
